title: smoothie
author: smoothie
content: Donation Auction #3 For Cold Key VictimsLOT 1ONE 1/4 oz 999 fine GOLD Bitcoin Penny 2018 year (original packaging with hologram in tact) (Donated by Smoothie)Minor note- This coin up for sale is IN an unopened SEALED package. The picture is of an opened coin. Please note this when bidding as I have not personally seen the coin given the in tact hologram packaging not being opened since receiving it from BP.LOT 2ONE Unloaded (peeled) 2016 0.1btc microsoul gold plated bar, with 2 holograms (Donated by Henkcryptotank)LOT 3ONE 3 coin set of unfunded ravenbit cryptopods Â Copper #18, Brass #51, Bronze #84 (Donated by Est2013)LOT 4ONE Â Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 Base Set (Donated by NovemberMan)LOT 5Rainbow(VIBGYOR) colour series - Orange set - # Â  64 (0.01 BTC and 0.001 BTC) - unfunded (Donated by raritycheck)LOT 6#4 1 LTC Bar for the relief auction / fund; homage to the Lealana 1 LTC coin.Bar is 3.6 OZT .999 FS. Funded with 1 LTC (Donated by ClayCastCrypto)LOT 7ONE 2023 7.77 gram silver Puerto Rico 250,000 Satoshi Prototype piece Serial #4. Fully funded (Donated by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES)LOT 8THREE 2013 Brass 0.10 Lealanas (unfunded w/ addy's) & ONE Autographed Norman Comics SMOOVEHAIR Physical card w/ XCP/BTC SMOOVEHAIRFB NFT (Donated by Sweeteye)LOT 9THREE buyer funded or diy auction MyBits 2022 Plated bars buyer funded or DIY (Donated by Mr.MojoRising26)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________1) ONE 1/4 oz 999 fine GOLD Bitcoin Penny 2018 year (original packaging with hologram in tact) (Donated by Smoothie) 2) ONE Unloaded (peeled) 2016 0.1btc microsoul gold plated bar, with 2 holograms (Donated by Henkcryptotank)3) ONE 3 coin set of unfunded ravenbit cryptopods Â Copper #18, Brass #51, Bronze #84 (Donated by Est2013)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________4) ONE Â Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 Base Set (Donated by NovemberMan) 5) Rainbow(VIBGYOR) colour series - Orange set - # Â  64 (0.01 BTC and 0.001 BTC) - unfunded (Donated by raritycheck)6) #4 1 LTC Bar for the relief auction / fund; homage to the Lealana 1 LTC coin.Bar is 3.6 OZT .999 FS. Funded with 1 LTC (Donated by ClayCastCrypto)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________7) ONE 2023 7.77 gram silver Puerto Rico 250,000 Satoshi Prototype piece Serial #4. Fully funded (Donated by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES)  THREE 2013 Brass 0.10 Lealanas (unfunded w/ addy's) & ONE Autographed Norman Comics SMOOVEHAIR Physical card w/ XCP/BTC SMOOVEHAIRFB NFT (Donated by Sweeteye)9) THREE buyer funded or diy auction MyBits 2022 Plated bars buyer funded or DIY (Donated by Mr.MojoRising26)Starting Bid for all lots: 0.00 BTCMinimum Bid increment for all lots is 0.0001END TIME: Â February 25th, 2023 Â 6:00PM ESTPayment is due within 24 hours of auction ending.SNIPING: Any bid made in the last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction an additional 5 minutes PER LOT.If no new bid is made within the 5 minute extension the auction will end, if a bid does come within that 5 minute period, the auction extends 5 minutes from the time that last bid was made.PAYMENT: Bitcoin See PGP bitcoin address from MinerJones belowShipping is based on location and preference. Please contact minerjones if you win an auction lot.Regarding payment confirmation please also contact MJ.-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA512February 1 2023 minerjones using address bc1qw5v9xtsasvrecnypx95gmew6ptzzy3fprr7gy9 to accept proceeds from the Coldkey victim auctions-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----Version: Keybase OpenPGP v2.1.13Comment: https://keybase.-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
